Name: Lothian League
ReputationStatements: We've heard ye'r a competent mercenary. We've bin havin some trauchle lately, 'n' if ye cuid resolve it fur us, we'll ensure ye'r paid weel. If nae, sae be it.

MissionSuccessStatement: Weel dane, commander. We obviously placed oor faith in th' richt mercenary company. We'll let ye ken if we hae any other work fur ye.
GoodFaithFailureStatement: Ye win some, ye lose some. Whiles tis in atween. A'm disappointed ye coudnae complete th' contract, bit at least ye gave it yer best shot.
BadFaithFailureStatement: Fur somebody wha cam sae gey recommended, ye let us doon bonny solid. Cheers fur hee haw, ya gobshite.
Description: The Lothian League is a small Periphery realm composed of a small number of ice-and-snow planets located beyond the outer reaches of the Free Worlds League near the Marian Hegemony. Ruled by the Grand Mistress of the Lothian League, it has no standing army and relies on Mercenary units for military might.
